issues.description: Problem statement (Aufgabe 06) asks for the Anzahl (count) of Wanderwege that lead to Gemeinden with mehr than 500000 mÃ¤nnlichen Einwohnern, i.e. a single numeric result. The solution file solution_repository/aufgabe06.sql uses `SELECT *` and thus returns rows/columns instead of a single count. This makes the solution inconsistent with the specified expected output and will confuse students (and automated tests) about the required result shape.
issues.suggested_fix:
Change the SELECT in solution_repository/aufgabe06.sql to return a single count value. For example:

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM Wanderweg_zu_Gemeinde, Gemeinde
WHERE Gemeinde.schluessel = Wanderweg_zu_Gemeinde.gemeindeschluessel
  AND Gemeinde.einwohner_m > 500000;

(If the intention is to count distinct Wanderweg IDs rather than rows, use COUNT(DISTINCT Wanderweg_zu_Gemeinde.wanderweg_id) instead.)
